item.title: Convert a linear index to lower triangular subscripts
item.description: In this post, I present a way to convert a linear index to lower triangular subscripts, i.e. row and column number in a triangular matrix. The proposed functions work for different numbering directions (rowwise, colwise, and diagwise), including or excluding the diagonal.
